typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		code_type_id as long,
		code2 as string,
		target_description as string,
		source_system as string,
		om_x_ref as string,
		target_code as string,
		code_type as string,
		source_code_key as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'select * from dwh_stage.t_crossreference',
	format: 'query') ~> tcrossreference
tcrossreference filter(code_type_id==106 && target_code!='PI') ~> businessarea
xrefBusarea aggregate(groupBy(bus_description),
	bus_key = first(bus_key)) ~> deduplicator
deduplicator derive(grp_key = case(in(['EN','BU'],bus_key), 'EG', case(in(['PM', 'PF'], bus_key), 'PI', bus_key)),
		grp_description = case(in(['EN','BU'],bus_key), 'Energy+', case(in(['PM', 'PF'], bus_key), 'P&I', bus_description)),
		bua_key = case(in(['PM','PF'],bus_key), 'PI', bus_key),
		bua_description = case(in(['PM','PF'],bus_key), 'P&I', bus_description),
		last_updated_by = 'm_pre_dim_business_area') ~> expression
businessarea select(mapColumn(
		bus_key = target_code,
		bus_description = target_description
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> xrefBusarea
expression select(mapColumn(
		bus_description,
		bus_key,
		grp_key,
		grp_description,
		bua_key,
		bua_description,
		last_updated_by
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> predimbusareatable
predimbusareatable alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> alterrow
alterrow sink(input(
		pk_key as string,
		date_last_updated as timestamp,
		date_inserted as timestamp,
		bus_description as string,
		grp_key as string,
		bua_description as string,
		bua_key as string,
		last_updated_by as string,
		grp_description as string,
		inserted_by as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['bus_key'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		pk_key = bus_key,
		bus_description,
		grp_key,
		bua_description,
		bua_key,
		last_updated_by,
		grp_description
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> preDimBusinessArea
